widget:
Bing And Ping Calculator Game
The app allows you to compete with your friends with an easy arithmetic. No decimal, but just pure digit random from 1 to 9. If you use Mutiplcation or division, you will get 2 points. Using Ding allow you get extra 1 points . However, if it is not correct i will minus you 1 point.
Darayuth Hang
